tr.td: Functional magnetic resonance imaging, Prism adaptation
1.5-T MR scanner (Signa Excite, Optima MR450w 1.5T, GE Healthcare, United Kingdom)
These data consisted of healthy adults
Resting-state: participants kept their eyes open and fixated on a black cross. Each resting-state scan lasted for 10 min.

Tsujimoto K, Mizuno K, Nishida D, Tahara M, Yamada E, Shindo S et al. Prism adaptation changes resting-state functional connectivity in the dorsal stream of visual attention networks in healthy adults: A fMRI study. Cortex, 18, pp. 30351–30354, 2018.
